plugin.description:
This plugin allows to include dynamic content in SPIP articles using the TinyButStrong Template Engine
• [TBS website->http://www.tinybutstrong.com]
• [Online documentation->http://www.tinybutstrong.com/plugins/spip/tinybutstrong_help.html]
• Local documentation: [manual install->../plugins/tinybutstrong/tinybutstrong_help.html] or [auto install->../plugins/auto/tinybutstrong/tinybutstrong_help.html]
